abstract: Technicolor rejected a revised investment bid by JPMorgan Chase on Monday after the film equipment maker’s board deemed the newer offer too onerous.
snippet: Technicolor rejected a revised investment bid by JPMorgan Chase on Monday after the film equipment maker’s board deemed the newer offer too onerous.
lead_paragraph: Technicolor rejected a revised investment bid by JPMorgan Chase on Monday after the film equipment maker’s board deemed the newer offer too onerous.

headline.main: Technicolor Rejects Higher JPMorgan Investment Proposal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
